internal.content:
---
title: Managing jobs
description: Guides for managing jobs
---

<PageDescription>

A scan is consist of jobs. If you want to control the scan further, go to the **Jobs** tab on the scan detail page.

</PageDescription>

title: Managing jobs

<PageDescription>

A scan is consist of jobs. If you want to control the scan further, go to the **Jobs** tab on the scan detail page.

</PageDescription>
